game.name: Train Simulator: Western Maryland I-2 Class
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: With Machine Rail’s powerful Western Maryland I-2 Decapod for Train Simulator Classic, you’ll climb aboard an extraordinary behemoth of a locomotive to experience steam-era railroading at its memorable best!
game.shortDescriptionEn: With Machine Rail’s powerful Western Maryland I-2 Decapod for Train Simulator Classic, you’ll climb aboard an extraordinary behemoth of a locomotive to experience steam-era railroading at its memorable best!
